Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.ibm.watson.discovery.v2.query.AggregationDeserializer
    This class has been replaced by logic inside of the QueryAggregation class.
    com.ibm.watson.discovery.v1.query.AggregationDeserializer
    This class has been replaced by logic inside of the QueryAggregation class.
    com.ibm.watson.compare_comply.v1.CompareComply
    On 30 November 2021, Compare and Comply will no longer be available. For more information, see Compare and Comply Deprecation (https://github.com/watson-developer-cloud/java-sdk#compare-and-comply-deprecation).
    com.ibm.watson.discovery.v2.query.GenericQueryAggregation
    This class is no longer necessary with the built-in deserialization logic in the QueryAggregation class.
    com.ibm.watson.discovery.v1.query.GenericQueryAggregation
    This class is no longer necessary with the built-in deserialization logic in the QueryAggregation class.
    com.ibm.watson.natural_language_classifier.v1.NaturalLanguageClassifier
    On 9 August 2021, IBM announced the deprecation of IBM Watson&trade; Natural Language Classifier. As of 9 September 2021, you cannot create new instances. However, existing instances are supported until 8 August 2022. The service will no longer be available on 8 August 2022.<br/><br/>As an alternative, consider migrating to IBM Watson Natural Language Understanding. For more information, see [Migrating to Natural Language Understanding](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/natural-language-classifier?topic=natural-language-classifier-migrating). {: deprecated}

    Natural Language Classifier uses machine learning algorithms to return the top matching predefined classes for short text input. You create and train a classifier to connect predefined classes to example texts so that the service can apply those classes to new inputs.

    API Version: 1.0 See: https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/natural-language-classifier
    com.ibm.watson.personality_insights.v3.PersonalityInsights
    On 1 December 2021, Personality Insights will no longer be available. Consider migrating to Watson Natural Language Understanding. For more information, see Personality Insights Deprecation (https://github.com/watson-developer-cloud/java-sdk/tree/master#personality-insights-deprecation).
    com.ibm.watson.visual_recognition.v3.VisualRecognition
    On 1 December 2021, Visual Recognition will no longer be available. For more information, see Visual Recognition Deprecation (https://github.com/watson-developer-cloud/java-sdk/tree/master#visual-recognition-deprecation).
    com.ibm.watson.visual_recognition.v4.VisualRecognition
    On 1 December 2021, Visual Recognition will no longer be available. For more information, see Visual Recognition Deprecation (https://github.com/watson-developer-cloud/java-sdk/tree/master#visual-recognition-deprecation).
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    com.ibm.watson.discovery.v1.query.AggregationType
    This class has been replaced by the top-level version in com.ibm.watson.discovery.query.
    com.ibm.watson.discovery.v1.query.Operator
    This class has been replaced by the top-level version in com.ibm.watson.discovery.query.
